mutants.code:
import re

def transform_sentence(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.upper()
    sentence = re.sub('', '', sentence)
    words = sentence.split()
    words = words[::-1]
    return ' '.join(words)

import re

def transform_sentence(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.upper()
    sentence = re.sub('[^A-Z! ]+', 'MUTATED', sentence)
    words = sentence.split()
    words = words[::-1]
    return ' '.join(words)

import re

def transform_sentence(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.upper()
    sentence = re.sub('[^A-Z! ]+', '', sentence)
    words = sentence.split()
    words = words[::+1]
    return ' '.join(words)

import re

def transform_sentence(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.upper()
    sentence = re.sub('[^A-Z! ]+', '', sentence)
    words = sentence.split()
    words = words[::--1]
    return ' '.join(words)
